message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I am confident it would be a worthwhile investment. I am offering this exceptional product to you for $1,150,000. I am eager to facilitate this transaction and ensure you receive the best possible deal.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're placing on the product. However, I'm looking to spend closer to $1,050,000.  Let's see if we can find a middle ground.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet within my valuation range. To further explore a mutually beneficial agreement, I propose adjusting the price to $1,075,000. This offers a compromise between our positions and maintains a fair value for the product. I look forward to your consideration of this proposal.
